propositions.text: The protagonist experiences an unexpected穿越 (time travel) to a female-dominated world.
The societal structure of female dominance and male subservience is shocking and challenging to adapt to.
Initial struggles include language barriers and cultural differences.
The protagonist faces suspicion and alienation from locals.
An ally, 欧阳芷 (Ouyang Zhi), provides crucial support and guidance.
Ouyang Zhi teaches language, customs, and offers shelter.
Gradual integration into the new world involves learning and adapting to its ways.
Discovery of a special ability to foresee future events brings both advantage and suspicion.
Involvement in power struggles between Ouyang Zhi’s family and the Lin family creates conflict.
The protagonist is torn between loyalties to Ouyang Zhi and 林若曦 (Lin Ruoxi).
Complex emotional relationships develop with Ouyang Zhi and Lin Ruoxi.
Rising status in the world brings increasing dangers and conspiracies.
The truth behind the穿越 is revealed as a purposeful act tied to a mysterious mission.
A final decision must be made between staying to fulfill the mission or seeking a way home.

concepts.name: 穿越 (Time Travel)
concepts.context: Central theme of the protagonist’s journey to a different era.

concepts.name: 女尊 (Female Dominance)
concepts.context: Core societal structure where women hold power over men.

concepts.name: 权力斗争 (Power Struggle)
concepts.context: Conflict between influential families in the female-dominated society.

concepts.name: 情感纠葛 (Emotional Entanglement)
concepts.context: Complex relationships and feelings between the protagonist and key characters.

concepts.name: 特殊能力 (Special Ability)
concepts.context: Protagonist’s unique power to foresee future events.

main_topics: 权力与情感冲突 (Power and Emotional Conflicts)
hierarchy.structure: The document follows a chronological narrative structure, detailing the protagonist’s journey from arrival and adaptation to involvement in societal conflicts and personal dilemmas in a female-dominated world.
